page.title: 13Road Traffic Survey,Kirkby
page.content:
On Friday,3rd May 1985,a group of children went to the "Nag's Head" crossroads where the flow of vehicles is controlled by traffic lights. Two children observed and recorded the vehicles going in one direction during a 15 minute period from 11.18 to 11.33 a.m. {The results of the count were: Vehicles travelling along.....
{ STATION ST}KINGSWAY{DIAMOND A}LOWMOOR cars {84} 95 { 51} 57 buses{ 3 } 1 { 0 } 0 lorries{6 } 6 { 5 } 14 vans {10 } 17 { 10 } 10 m'bikes{3 } 2 { 1 } 0 cycles {0 } 0 { 2 } 3 others {0 } 1 { 1 } 3
TOTAL{106 } 122 { 70 } 87
